messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Steve Jobs - CEO of Apple and Pixar: Do what you love!
messages.msgSnippet: ... He even talked about connecting the dots! The bit about calligraphy was neat too.  It shows that you just never know how a current interest might lead to
messages.messageBody:
>>>>>>>>>It sounds a lot like he is of the unschooling mentality>>>>>>>>>>>

He even talked about connecting the dots!

The bit about calligraphy was neat too. It shows that you just never know how a current interest might lead to something important in the future.

Mary Ellen



----- Original Message -----

messages.subject: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Steve Jobs - CEO of Apple and Pixar: Do what you love!
messages.msgSnippet: Forgive me if you all have heard this already but I just got an e-mail from mercola.com about Steve Jobs giving a commencement speech recently. It sounds a lot
messages.messageBody:
Forgive me if you all have heard this already but I just got an e-mail from
mercola.com about Steve Jobs giving a commencement speech recently.

It sounds a lot like he is of the unschooling mentality (even though he
"unschooled" during college years) and I was surprised to see it on Mercola!

Beautiful!

http://www.mercola.com/2005/jul/5/steve_jobs.htm

-amy


"List Posting Policies" are provided in the files area of this group.
